categories: Category:Alliance to Restore the Republic military bases

nodes.text: The Rebel Base was an installation on the planet Barkhesh during the Galactic Civil War operated by the Barkhesh Resistance. Shortly after the Battle of Yavin, the Barkhesh Resistance offered supplies to the Rebel Alliance. A supply convoy left the base, escorted by the Rebel's Rogue Squadron, to hook up with an Alliance Lambda-class T-4a shuttle. Rogue Squadron protected the convoy, and also deterred an assault on the base itself by a lone TIE bomber.
The Rebel Base appears in the 1998 video game Star Wars: Rogue Squadron.
